clues.text: The Sami are also known by this name; a "land" within the European Arctic Circle has been named for them

Many of the Sami make their living herding these animals of the family Cervidae
The Sami were long considered this type of people, from the Greek for "to wander in search of pasture"

rounds.text: Asked if he read novels, philosopher Gilbert Ryle said, "Yes, all six, every year", referring to this British author
